consultation.title: Consultation & Discovery
consultation.description: We begin by thoroughly understanding your challenge, goals, and context. This foundational step ensures we're solving the right problem in the right way.

solutionDesign.title: Solution Design
solutionDesign.description: Our team develops a comprehensive solution design that addresses your specific needs while considering scalability, user experience, and technical constraints.

development.title: Development & Implementation
development.description: We build your solution using agile methodologies, ensuring quality and adaptability throughout the development process.
